:::Jetstorm/Sharpedge:::

::Jetstorm gets hit by most of the various shots and goes inot stasis lock.  
Sharpedge also gets hit in many places, with mech fluid oozing out of his 
many wounds.  he sees Jetstorm injured::
Sharpedge: Dont worry buddy!
::He drags Jetstorm to the CR chambers in the Mafia base. and puts him in 
one.  than he goes in a Cr of his own::
